body.p: I have lived with Mr Edward. Evans's family most of the time for three years, I were there last september. He went to Glasgow on teusday morning, carried three or four ladies for witnesses. they came back home that day and left him he came home that night and went back next morning, he went several days, he came home one night. friday night I think, quite sick with headache. Saturday morning he had headache verry bad, got some better about noon, still sick that evening and next morning, he was about starting back to town with his witnesses on monday morning following, when he heard the trial was over.
